title: Did Tramp call USPS'most corrupt and anti-American voting'?
subtitle: The President of the United States expressed many (and varied) feelings about the postal vote in.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The President of the United States, Donald Trump, in Sean Hannity Radio, said that the United States postal service was the most "no-American" way to vote, and that he would try to dismantle it.
